mean_cn: n. 先入之见，预想，偏见
mean_en: an idea or opinion that is formed before you have enough information or experience
word_etyma: pre预先+con共同+cept拿，抓，握住+ion名词后缀→preconception预想
sentence: I had the preconception that my boss was mean; but after meeting him I realized I was wrong.
sentence_trans: 我先入为主地认为我的老板不好相处，但见面之后我意识到自己错了。
